text: Hi HN! I made this for myself to submit stuff to HN without copy pasting. I also recently added a thing to check if anyone else already submitted the link to avoid posting duplicates. I find it pretty useful myself and I hope you do too!
title: Show HN: Check if anyone else submitted a thing to HN and then submit it
